standard_metadata.standard_description: Apply and extend previous understandings of multiplication and division and of fractions to multiply and divide rational numbers.
standard_metadata.standard_title: Order of operations with negative numbers

hints.content: Remember that a negative sign is only part of the base of an exponent if it is inside parentheses with the base.
